<title level="1" right="Rules">[Sewer Gas](/Rules.aspx?ID=2804)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Sewer gas often contains pockets of highly flammable gas. A pocket of sewer gas exposed to a source of flame explodes, dealing moderate environmental fire damage to creatures in the area.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
